resources.string: Show events in the Notification shade
Add \"My videos\" to Home screen to access local video files in a single tap.
Search for \"%s\" on the target website, then copy and paste URL here.
Added AI soundtrack successfully. Save video?
"About to download and install HD plug-in: "
"Mi Video is a system app that contains a local video player. You'll still be able to play video files after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
You can turn on personalised content recommendations in %s
"Mi Video can't access videos on your device. Allow access in the Settings."
Share your thoughts with our community
Not so fast! Wait a minute or two and try again.
Your published multiple comments containing items that violate our community standards. Your account is permanently suspended now. You can appeal against our decision using in-app feedback.
"Hi there! Mi Video is ready for an update. Update the app now to check out our new cool features! Mi Video Team"
How do you feel about Mi Video?
Could you give us your feedback as well?
Nice! Rate Mi Video in Play Store as well?

"You won't be able to use Mi Video online streaming services if you don't agree to our Privacy Policy. Tap \"Cancel\" to go back or \"Don't agree\" to continue and use Mi Video as a local player only."

"We've updated Mi Video Privacy Policy due to the adjustments in the services we offer. To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using the app."

"To be able to use its services, you must agree that %1$s will collect, process, and use your personal information. You'll be deemed to have read and agreed to our "Privacy Policy when you tap \"Agree\" below.

"To be able to use this service, you need to allow %1$s to collect, process, and use your personal information in accordance with the Privacy Policy. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to Xiaomi's Privacy Policy and User Agreement.

Tapping \"Agree\" also allows Mi Video to access the list of apps installed on your device. With this permission, Mi Video will be able to share items, understand whether an app is installed on your device, which version of an app is installed, and whether an app is secure."

"Welcome to Mi Video! This app provides the following services:

- Online streaming services

- A local video player

Mi Video needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You'll be able to change the related settings in Settings > Passwords & security.

Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Mi Video."

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Video. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Your withdrawal of consent to the Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept online services based on collected personal information.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
After you revoke authorisation, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from our servers. This might make the app virtually unusable. Revoke authorisation anyway?
You can customise the list of your channels now.
Tap a shortcut to open a website or enter URL
You can describe issues or provide suggestions here.
"Couldn't submit. Check your network settings and try again."
Submitted successfully. Thanks for your feedback!
File with %1$s name already exists. Please rename
Not enough storage space. Free up at least %d MB and launch the app again.
Tap the screen to try again
Double tap to open HD preview
"Can't play audio track video due to copyright restrictions"
"Can't play this video due to copyright restrictions"
You can help us improve our services by enrolling in User Experience Programme and allowing Mi Video to connect to the internet. Agree?
Double tap again to open HD preview
Unsupported frame rate. Switched back to regular speed.
"Can't add soundtrack to the selected video"
Connect to Wi-Fi or turn on mobile data in the network settings.
Using mobile data to stream videos may generate additional carrier fees
Manage files %$s Add subtitles %$s Cast videos %$s
Protect your private videos with a password %$s
Download videos from TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter %$s
%$s Check out all the cool features of Mi Video!
%1$s Download videos for free %2$s Manage files
Mi Video needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Agree?
Give Mi Video the required permissions to be able to use this feature.
Mi Video needs permissions to work normally. Clear all app data in the Settings and open the app again.
Mi Video needs permissions to work normally. Go to Settings and give Mi Video the required permissions.
To be able to use local video player, allow this app to access storage first.
To be able to use local video player, allow this app to access storage in the \"Permissions\" section of the Settings.
Playing at the regular speed now
Tap \"Back\" again to cancel saving video
The text you entered is too long
"Couldn't recognise speech while you were recording"
Discard all changes and stop editing subtitles now?
"You won't be able to save this video if you quit now. Quit anyway?"
"This video can't be played on your device."
"The following channels won't be displayed on the Home page."
You can enter up to 1000 characters
You can change your language preferences in Profile > Language.
Select your language preferences to receive more relevant content recommendations. You can change your language preferences in Profile > Language.
You can select language preferences for content in Account > Language.
The videos you film will appear here
Sign in to be able to receive our replies to your feedback.
To control playback, tap the bar at the bottom.
You can only send 1 file at a time
Set successfully. View hidden items in the \"Hidden videos\" folder.
Mi Video is ready to install
Update Mi Video to take screenshots
"Your system doesn't support recording sound. The recordings are silent."
Recorded successfully. You can share now.
Set password to view hidden videos
Took a screenshot successfully. You can share it now.
"Couldn't add subtitles. Make sure the file isn't corrupted."

Get subtitles

from opensubtitles.org.

All online subtitles are provided by opensubtitles.org.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Connect and try again."
Set successfully. You can view unhidden items now.

Use gestures to zoom in and out
Update Mi Video to use all its features
Take a look at new channels!
"Can't use this feature now. Network access is restricted."
Downloading items using mobile data might generate additional carrier fees. Download anyway?
"There's an update on your feedback. Tap to view."
Show minimised player in the Notification shade
Mi Video can notify you about popular videos and your subscriptions.
"You won't receive personalised content recommendations from Firework"
"You'll receive personalised content recommendations from Firework"
Paused background playback due to insufficient memory
"Couldn't find media file. Jumped to the upper-level folder."
"Couldn't load info. Pull down to refresh."
Update Mi Video plug-in to the latest version to be able to play this video. Update now?
"Can't play this video. Update Mi Video to the latest version first."
Clear cache files saved on your device
"Some features won't be available if you revoke authorisation"
"Couldn't initialise plug-in. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Mi Video needs to access the IMEI number of your device to do the following:
Better customise its services for your device;
Increase the security of your account.​
For accessing device status and pausing playback during calls
For accessing items, saving files, displaying and playing local videos
This playlist is no longer available.

subtitles in the opensubtitles.org database.
All subtitles are provided by opensubtitles.org."
By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Video.

Sync favourites from this device to your account? Items that are no longer available will be removed.
Mi Video is up to date.
Password should be at least 4 characters long
Password must be at least 4 characters long
The password you entered is incorrect. Try again.

"Since you have not previously agreed to the terms of the corresponding Privacy Policy of the third party content provider, we can't display video content in Moments. Tap the button below to agree to the Privacy Policy and access this feature."
Tap to view more videos from this account

Content from Moments is provided by Firework. In order to improve your viewing experience and receive more relevant content recommendations, allow Firework to collect, process, and use your personal information in accordance with its Privacy Policy. Read and agree to Firework Privacy Policy before using its services.
Tap to find more videos on this topic
